channel.title: Those with Sky-Broadband Please Read
channel.description:
Ok, I've just had a long & frustrating call with Sky Broadband. I spoke to a represent for them & i asked them If they supported Port Forwarding. The answer was no. The woman then said "Users that use Sky Broadband have no rights to portforward as it is a breach of there contract. As soon as your Broadband is suspended for going against there contract will get you an automated black spot"
This is just a warning. She then put me to tier 3 - There represensitives who say "Running servers are strictly prohibited with Sky Broadband. You'll get a blacks spot and you'll be suspended."
Please, This is for your safety for all Sky Users. I suggest moving to a different ISP or not putting a server online.
Thanks Ghost.
PS - Dont believe me? Go screw yourself, i couldnt care less

item.title: Those with Sky-Broadband Please Read
item.dc:creator: @gh0styscape gh0styscape
item.description:
@gh0styscape wrote:

Ok,
I’ve just had a long & frustrating call with Sky Broadband. I spoke to a represent for them & i asked them If they supported Port Forwarding. The answer was no. The woman then said
“Users that use Sky Broadband have no rights to portforward as it is a breach of there contract. As soon as your Broadband is suspended for going against there contract will get you an automated black spot”

This is just a warning. She then put me to tier 3 - There represensitives who say “Running servers are strictly prohibited with Sky Broadband. You’ll get a blacks spot and you’ll be suspended.”

Please,
This is for your safety for all Sky Users. I suggest moving to a different ISP or not putting a server online.

Thanks
Ghost.

Dont believe me? Go screw yourself, i couldnt care less
